mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Loan (empNo, loanDt, loanAmt, monthRepayAmt, loanRate, loanBalance, repayFrom, repayTo, lastRepayDt, frepayYn, agreeYn) VALUES (#{empNo}, #{loanDt}, #{loanAmt}, #{monthRepayAmt}, #{loanRate}, #{loanBalance}, #{repayFrom}, #{repayTo}, #{lastRepayDt}, #{frepayYn}, #{agreeYn})
mapper.update: UPDATE Employee SET nm = #{nm}, passwd = #{passwd}, email = #{email}, birthDt = #{birthDt}, enterDt = #{enterDt}, retireDt= #{retireDt}, deptCd = #{deptCd}, teamCd = #{teamCd}, gradeCd = #{gradeCd}, positCd = #{positCd}, phoneNo = #{phoneNo}, addr = #{addr} WHERE empNo = #{empNo}
